creator: Ulearn Education Limited
descriptionHtml:
Ulearn is helping to study and learn at your own time and with the comfort of staying home

Learning is mostly difficult. We have not made it easy for you, but easiest.

Study on your couch, at dusk or dawn, at breakfast, on the go, with the total comfort of your own.
Don't feel stressed or overburdened. That is what we aim to eliminate for you from education.
Take pauses, 10 minutes or 2 hours, doesn’t matter. Freshen up your mind, and restart to absorb the core of concepts, anywhere, anytime.
Because Ulearn instructors are teaching you 247 the subjects and topics of your choice.

Ulearn is a UK based company established in 2014 to meet the needs of online learning / distance learning in the education sector.

Ulearn now introduces the “Teach Pakistan” program, a joint initiative of Ulearn and Learn 247, that aims to make quality education personalised, affordable and remotely accessible in all provinces of Pakistan.

Our mission is

To provide quality education resources at affordable prices
To revolutionise the teaching and learning ways
To maximise the potential of teaching and learning at national and international level.

As pilot projects, we have digitised courses like

FSc Pre-Engineering
FSc Pre-Medical
ICS

And entry tests like

NMDCAT
ECAT

according to the curriculum of all boards of Punjab and all provinces of Pakistan using a very unique interactive glass board learning technology.

Our teaching solutions meet the needs of learning communities of different levels by providing pre-recorded video lectures via an AI based Learning Management System that include

- Course content
- Customized notes for each module
- Short questions related to each topic with solutions
- Solved numerical questions and exercises
- MCQs for exam preparation
- Quizzes with feedback and self assessment
- Questions for instructor
- Group learning space
- 24/7 technical support
- Progress report for students and complete control for parents

Let the learning charm you this time.
Let's e-Learn for a secure future.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are excited to announce the release of version 2.1 of our Android app, which includes a brand new quiz feature as well as several bug fixes and improvements.

We hope you enjoy these new features and improvements. As always, if you have any feedback or suggestions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at
feedback@ulearnlms.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our team is pleased to announce the latest release of our Android app, version 2.2. This update includes several bug fixes and improvements that enhance the overall user experience. We have addressed issues related to app crashes. The app's performance and speed have also been improved, ensuring a smoother and faster experience. We hope you enjoy these improvements and look forward to hearing your feedback.

descriptionShort: Teach Pakistan Program - Online Video Classes | eLearning Project Of Ulearn

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Our team is excited to announce the release of version 2.4 of our Android app. This update brings the highly anticipated Test Session feature, which allows users to take tests in a dedicated session. Additionally, we have addressed issues related to app crashes, particularly those related to the video player. The app's performance and speed have been improved, ensuring a smoother and faster experience. We hope you enjoy these improvements and look forward to hearing your feedback.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are thrilled to introduce version 2.7 of our Android app, packed with exciting updates. This release focuses on improving app stability by addressing crashes and optimizing performance for a smoother user experience. In addition, we have added a new feature: Self Test Quiz! Now you can challenge yourself with quizzes and test your knowledge in various subjects.Thank you for your continued support, and happy learning!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're excited to unveil version 2.8 of our Android app, packed with enhancements. This release boosts app stability, optimises performance, and introduces the 'Ask a Question' feature, connecting you with our teachers. We've diligently resolved bugs for a smoother experience. Your ongoing support is invaluable to us, and we can't wait to see you benefit from these updates. Happy learning!

To maximise the potential of teaching and learning at national and international level.

As pilot projects, we have digitised courses like

FSc Pre-Engineering
FSc Pre-Medical
ICS

And entry tests like

NMDCAT
ECAT

according to the curriculum of all boards of Punjab and all provinces of Pakistan using a very unique interactive glass board learning technology.

Our teaching solutions meet the needs of learning communities of different levels by providing pre-recorded video lectures via an AI based Learning Management System that include

- Course content
- Customized notes for each module
- Short questions related to each topic with solutions
- Solved numerical questions and exercises
- MCQs for exam preparation
- Quizzes with feedback and self assessment
- Questions for instructor
- Group learning space
- 24/7 technical support
- Progress report for students and complete control for parents

Let the learning charm you this time.
Let's e-Learn for a secure future.
descriptionShort: Teach Pakistan Program - Online Video Classes | eLearning Project Of Ulearn

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're excited to present version 2.9 of our Android app, loaded with enhancements. This release prioritizes improving app stability and diligently resolving crashes. We've also revamped the quiz review screen to provide a smoother and more efficient experience. Your ongoing support is invaluable to us, and we can't wait for you to benefit from these updates. Happy learning!

title:
Ulearn EDU
2.9

creator: Ulearn Education Limited
descriptionHtml:
Ulearn is helping to study and learn at your own time and with the comfort of staying home

Learning is mostly difficult. We have not made it easy for you, but easiest.

Study on your couch, at dusk or dawn, at breakfast, on the go, with the total comfort of your own.
Don't feel stressed or overburdened. That is what we aim to eliminate for you from education.
Take pauses, 10 minutes or 2 hours, doesn’t matter. Freshen up your mind, and restart to absorb the core of concepts, anywhere, anytime.
Because Ulearn instructors are teaching you 247 the subjects and topics of your choice.

Ulearn is a UK based company established in 2014 to meet the needs of online learning / distance learning in the education sector.

Ulearn now introduces the “Teach Pakistan” program, a joint initiative of Ulearn and Learn 247, that aims to make quality education personalised, affordable and remotely accessible in all provinces of Pakistan.

Our mission is

To provide quality education resources at affordable prices
To revolutionise the teaching and learning ways
To maximise the potential of teaching and learning at national and international level.

As pilot projects, we have digitised courses like

FSc Pre-Engineering
FSc Pre-Medical
ICS

And entry tests like

NMDCAT
ECAT

according to the curriculum of all boards of Punjab and all provinces of Pakistan using a very unique interactive glass board learning technology.

Our teaching solutions meet the needs of learning communities of different levels by providing pre-recorded video lectures via an AI based Learning Management System that include

- Course content

- Solved numerical questions and exercises

- Quizzes with feedback and self assessment
- Questions for instructor

- 24/7 technical support
- Progress report for students and complete control for parents

Let the learning charm you this time.
Let's e-Learn for a secure future.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're excited to unveil version 2.9 of our Android app, featuring a plethora of enhancements. In this release, we've concentrated on enhancing app stability, effectively resolving bugs to ensure a smoother experience for our users. Additionally, we've made significant improvements to the user interface, particularly focusing on numericals and short questions. Don't forget to update to the latest version to enjoy these improvements. Thank you for your continued support, and happy learning!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're excited to unveil version 3.2 of our Android app, featuring many enhancements. In this release, we've focused on improving app stability by fixing bugs to ensure a smoother experience for our users. We've also added the ability to view student results for the MDCat test series, making it easier to track your progress. Don't forget to update to the latest version to enjoy these improvements. Thank you for your continued support, and happy learning!
